org.opendaylight.controller.sal.inventory

Interface IListenInventoryUpdates

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConnectionManager, StatisticsManager, SwitchManager

    public interface IListenInventoryUpdates
    The interface provides the methods to notify the upper applications in regards to any inventory changes.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void updateNode(Node node, UpdateType type, java.util.Set<Property> props)
      This method is called when some properties of a node are added/deleted/changed.
      void updateNodeConnector(NodeConnector nodeConnector, UpdateType type, java.util.Set<Property> props)
      This method is called when some properties of a node connector are added/deleted/changed.

    • Method Detail

      • updateNode

        void updateNode(Node node,
              UpdateType type,
              java.util.Set<Property> props)
        This method is called when some properties of a node are added/deleted/changed.
        Parameters:
        node - Node being updated
        type - UpdateType
        props - set of Property such as Description and/or Tier etc.

      • updateNodeConnector

        void updateNodeConnector(NodeConnector nodeConnector,
                       UpdateType type,
                       java.util.Set<Property> props)
        This method is called when some properties of a node connector are added/deleted/changed.
        Parameters:
        nodeConnector - NodeConnector being updated
        type - UpdateType
        props - set of Property such as Description and/or State etc.
